content.title: Add a Segment Widget to the FlexForm
content.body:
1. From the bottom-left corner of Iris, navigate to the Default Library.
  2. Next to the Default Library, you will see the My Libraries tab and a search icon . Click the search icon.
  3. In the search bar that appears, enter Segment.
  4. From the results, under Default, select Segment.
  5. Drag the Segment widget onto frmList on the canvas.
  6. From the Project explorer, right-click on the new segment and select Rename.
  7. Rename the segment employeeSegment.
